title: Bare Land for Sale in Thalawathugoda
details:
Highlights
- Land extent: 16 Perches
- Property is located on Weerasekera Mawatha, Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda.
- The property is located approx. 75 meters from Hokandara Road and approx. 750 meters from Thalawathugoda Junction.

Access
- The property is facing Weerasekera Mawatha which is approx. 20 feet wide.
- The property has access from Hokandara Road via Weerasekera Mawatha & Sirinanda Jothikarama Mawatha.
- The property also has access from the Battaramulla-Pannipitiya Main Road via Salinda Dissanayaka Mawatha [Avoiding Thalawathugoda Junction].

Features
- Bare land surrounded by boundary walls and gate.
- Quiet, residential area.
- Clear title.

Asking Price: LKR 1.8 Million Per Perch. [Negotiable]
